com.asemantics.rdfcoder.model.ontology
Class ValidatingCodeModel

java.lang.Object
  com.asemantics.rdfcoder.model.CodeModelBase
      com.asemantics.rdfcoder.model.ontology.ValidatingCodeModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
BackTrackingSupport, CodeModel
public class ValidatingCodeModel
extends CodeModelBase

This decorator validates addition of model triples over a given ontology.

See Also:
CodeModel, Ontology
